snippet: As Iran heads into a new round of talks over its nuclear program, the name of Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani, a former president and veteran of the Islamic revolution, has emerged as a possible conduit to compromise.
abstract: As Iran heads into a new round of talks over its nuclear program, the name of Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani, a former president and veteran of the Islamic revolution, has emerged as a possible conduit to compromise.

headline.main: Hoping Tehran's 'Wily Fox' Can Help Avert War
